General.Name: Kexin Development Co Ltd Shanxi
General.Description: Kexin Development Co.,Ltd,Shanxi provides media advertising, self-owned housing leasing, and architectural decoration engineering services. The company was formerly known as Guanghe Landscape Culture Communication Co., Ltd. Kexin Development Co.,Ltd,Shanxi was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

2.Name: Ms. Rong  Dai
2.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
